SageTVPlugin.Name: Gemstone z API
SageTVPlugin.Description: Gemstone API - Do not install directly as this is just a dependency!!
SageTVPlugin.Author: jusjoken,Fuzzy,PluckyHD
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: Version 1.0604 Fix for weather forecast widgets and added logging for flow filters Version 1.0601 Change weather system to use OpenWeatherMap using the 3.x version of the Google Weather plugin Version 1.0501 Minor changes to remove weather underground and add dark sky Version 1.0402 Minor change to handle default weather location Version 1.0401 Misc fixes - see forums Version 1.0203 NO CHANGES - just moved the packages to BinTray from Google Code
